DOCU_Docu.DOC:
About the Package An action pack for BizTalk using powerCLI.
=Supported versions=
=Setup= * The Agent should be able to access BizTalk powerCLI in order to executing CMDLET.
=Common Inputs= (None)
=Actions= Following actions are supported.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_MICROSOFT_BIZTALK.PUB.ACTION.START_APPLICATION * Action Description: This action Start application for provided application name.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_MICROSOFT_BIZTALK.PUB.ACTION.DELETE_APPLICATION * Action Description: This action Delete application for provided application name.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_MICROSOFT_BIZTALK.PUB.ACTION.STOP_APPLICATION * Action Description: This action Stop application for provided application name.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_MICROSOFT_BIZTALK.PUB.ACTION.UNINSTALL_APPLICATION * Action Description: This action uninstall a application for provided application name.
